$single = \' ;
$space = ' ' ;
$double = \" ;
$back = \` ;
$tab = \u0008 ;
$makeRight = [[:Z:][:Ps:][:Pi:]$] ;
$back $back → “ ;
$back → ‘ ;
$makeRight {$double} ↔ “ ;
$double ↔ ” ;
$makeRight {$single} ↔ ‘ ;
$single ↔ ’;
$space {$space} → ;
'--' ↔ — ;
